title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about Canada speeding drug reviews, Novo Nordisk ads, and more
description: Health Canada is planning to speed up reviews of some drugs by piggybacking on the decisions of foreign regulators, including possibly the U.S. FDA
content: Health Canada is planning to speed up reviews of some drugs by piggybacking on the decisions of foreign regulators, including possibly the U.S. FDA
